So basically you shoot a gun that makes holes over and over. Luckily those holes arent bullet holes.
And you experiance a very good story that only has 3 characthers (including you).
So if you like guns that makes holes (not bullet holes) and a great story that has very few characters this game is for you

J'y ai joué en mode hors-ligne (tu peux pas voir mais je dois avoir 10/15 heures de jeu dessus) et j'aimerais vous faire part de mon avis :
[h1] Les moins  [/h1]

-Moins bien que le 1
-plus compliqué [un bon point pour certain)
-plus répétitif 
[h1] Les PLUS  [/h1]
Plus beau graphiquement
-le mode coop
opti et beau
plus longue durée de vie

10 kisses out of 10

It's not even really a puzzle game, in a way. It's a narrative-focused game masquerading as a puzzle game. Its nine impeccably paced chapters feature a clear inciting incident, midpoint, point of no return, climax, and brief epilogue. As textbook as it is brilliant.

[IT] Gioco fantastico, capolavoro assoluto e pilastro, a mio parere, del mondo videoludico. Molto bella la campagna (per la quale consiglio prima di finire Portal 1, bellissimo anche lui) e molto divertente la modalità in co-op. I personaggi sono perfetti e hanno un grandissimo carisma. inutile dirlo, ma totalmente consigliato (molto spesso si trova in pacchetto con Portal 1, per un totale di 2 euro).

Лучшая головоломка в мире!

Плюсы:

Хорошая графика.
Сложные (иногда) головоломки.
Самый лучший сюжет в мире! (Играл в первый portal на пиратке).
Песня в конце (я не мог не дать за это плюс).
Хорошая оптимизация.
Мало багов (да они есть).
Куча всяких дополнений (по типу Aperture Tag, Portal Stories: Mel, и тд.)

Минусы (они незначительны по сравнению с плюсами):

Сложно (очень) получить все достижения.
Также если ты хочешь получить все достижения - тебе нужен друг или напарник (не у каждого он есть).

Итог:
Сюжет 12/10
Графика 9/10
Песня в конце 99999/10

Также люблю места где можно пробанихопить или как то сократить уровень)


Итоговая оценка игры: 10/10

It's so freaking fun
The unique game play and its story telling is insane

TLDR: An essential PC game, everyone with a PC that considers themselves a PC gamer should play this at least once in their life.

Portal is a game like no other, not only in mechanics but in the way it can build the world without directly telling the player anything. The story is gripping, the puzzle aspects are challenging but rewarding, and the second game adds some refreshing new aspects like different liquids that can be portalled around. And don't even get me started on the co-op.

The co-op is in my opinion the best part of this game. And while the singleplayer is great, the co-op takes it to a whole other level. I probably have spent 75% of my hours in this game just messing around with friends, sabotaging them while also having a fun time putting our 2 brain cells together to try and solve the levels. I wish the co-op was longer, but this game is well worth the money for the co-op alone.

Muy bueno, al inicio parece mas de lo mismo con respecto a portal 1 pero luego se va tornando mucho mas interesante y los escenarios cambian drasticamente, tambien hay muchos nuevos elementos para resolver los niveles de formas muy creativas y por fin nos revelan los inicios de aperture science y su creador. Puntuacion: 9/10
Nice brain teaser with a lot's of humor.
Even after almost a decade this is still by far one of the most clever puzzle games.
Baş yapıt müzikleri hikayesi karakterleri  (sondaki glados sahnesi mükemmeldi) 10/10
